attributes.action: Save the NHS. Reduce unnecessary bureaucracy, stop the closures and keep all nurses, doctors and midwives threatened with redundancy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After all the extra money that has been given to the NHS over the last few years, why are hospitals closing, and jobs being cut?  
 
 The Prime Minister admitted it is happening at Question Time last week. So we are petitioning the Prime Minister to save the NHS - it's services and staff - as he promised to in 1997.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save the NHS. Reduce unnecessary bureaucracy, stop the closures and keep all nurses, doctors and midwives threatened with redundancy."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page10839.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/SavetheNHS/
